Name: Potion
Description: Restores 100 HP outside of battle, or 150 HP in battle. Potency is doubled with Chemist. Used automatically with Auto-Potion.

Name: Hi-Potion
Description: Restores 300 HP outside of battle, or 450 HP in battle. Potency is doubled with Chemist. Used automatically with Auto-Potion.

Name: Phoenix Down
Description: Revives a single character from KO. Instant death to undead target.

Name: Phoenix Pinion
Description: Recovers a character from KO, recovering 1-10 HP. Instant death to undead target. HP drops to 1-10 if target is a zombie. Has no effect if target is a zombie and KO. Can only be used in battle.

Name: Elixir
Description: Fully restores HP and MP.

Name: Annoyntment
Description: Cures Trouble status.

Name: Antidote
Description: Cures Poison and Venom statuses.

Name: Soft
Description: Cures Petrify and Gradual Petrify status.

Name: Gysahl Green
Description: Used to call a chocobo (on field) or cure Berserk (in battle).

Name: Eye Drops
Description: Cures Darkness status.

Name: Echo Screen
Description: Cures Silence status.

Name: Vaccine
Description: Cures Virus status.

Name: Magic Tag
Description: Cures Zombie.

Name: Remedy
Description: Restores 100 MP outside of battle, or 150 MP in battle. Potency is doubled with Chemist.

Name: Tent
Description: Use when talking to a moogle to restore a large amount of HP and MP. In battle can inflict Darkness, Poison, and Silence statuses.

Name: Dark Matter
Description: Deals 9999 damage to the enemy. Rare item. Can be used as an add-on.

Name: Dead Pepper
Description: Deals 30 damage for every dead pepper in the inventory. Lets Choco reach new areas when used on the field.

Name: Silver Pendant
Description: Garnet's pendant.

Name: Memory Earring
Description: One of four rare jewels. Given by Eiko in Madain Sari.

Name: Falcon Claw
Description: One of the four jewels.

Name: Desert Star
Description: One of the four jewels.

Name: Ticket
Description: A ticket to the play in Alexandria, owned by Vivi.

Name: Blank's Medicine
Description: Blank gives this item before exploring the Evil Forest. Used to cure Garnet of the Plant Brain's seed.

Name: Continental Map
Description: Given by Blank in the Evil Forest.

Name: World Map
Description: Given by Regent Cid before leaving Lindblum.

Name: Moogle's Flute
Description: Given to by Mogster in the Evil Forest. Allows one to call on a moogle anywhere on the world map.

Name: Kupo Nut
Description: Given to the moogle husband in Gizamaluke's Grotto for rewards. Can be found in Lindblum in the 'Vivi's shopping' ATE and more are obtained by delivering letters for the moogles.

Name: Gizamaluke Bell
Description: Given by a wounded soldier in Gizamaluke's Grotto. Opens the door to the Bell Room.

Name: Holy Bell
Description: Found in the cavern of Gizamaluke's Grotto that opens the left door in the Bell Room.

Name: Protection Bell
Description: Found under a bed in Burmecia.

Name: Gate Pass
Description: This is an item given to Steiner at the Bohden Gate.

Name: Supersoft
Description: Given by Doctor Tot in his tower in Treno.

Name: Unusual Potion
Description: This is given in the Theater Avenue by Cinna. Another part of Cid's 'cure'.

Name: Beautiful Potion
Description: A potion given by Alice in the weapon shop, after Lindblum lies in ruins.

Name: Strange Potion
Description: Another ingredient for the supposed 'cure' to Cid's problem. Found in the studio of Self-Proclaimed Artist Michael in the Theater District.

Name: Gulug Stone
Description: An item retrieved after battling Ark in Oeilvert.

Name: Earth Mirror
Description: An item recovered from a wall in Ipsen's Castle. One of the four mirrors used to open the seal to Terra.

Name: Water Mirror
Description: An item recovered from a wall in Ipsen's Castle. One of the four mirrors used to open the seal to Terra.

Name: Fire Mirror
Description: An item recovered from a wall in Ipsen's Castle. One of the four mirrors used to open the seal to Terra.

Name: Wind Mirror
Description: An item recovered from a wall in Ipsen's Castle. One of the four mirrors used to open the seal to Terra.

Name: King of Jump Rope
Description: Reward from the Jump Rope game after 1,000+ leaps.

Name: Athlete Queen
Description: The final item received when Vivi is victorious in his races against Hippaul.

Name: Mayor's Key
Description: Discovered in the mayor's house in Dali. Used to enter the locked part of the windmill. Can only be obtained by leaving Treno during the card tournament and traveling to Dali.

Name: Moccha Coffee
Description: Another of the many coffees found on Gaia. Found in the Bohden Arch next to the spring. Part of Morrid's coffee sidequest.

Name: Kirman Coffee
Description: Found in Eiko's kitchen in Madain Sari. Part of Morrid's coffee sidequest.

Name: Burman Coffee
Description: Found in a chest in the locked part of the Dali windmill, along with 30,000 gil. Not accessible until the player has the mayor's key. Can only be obtained by leaving Treno during the card tournament, and traveling to Dali.

Name: Master Hunter
Description: Received after the Festival of the Hunt in Lindblum, along with other items depending on who of the party is victorious.

Name: Mini-Brahne
Description: A mini figurine found in the Dali Mayor's House. Can only be obtained by leaving Treno during the card tournament and traveling to Dali.

Name: Mini-Cid
Description: A mini figurine and the cheapest of all the items which can be bought in the Treno auction house, with a starting bid of only 500 gil.

Name: Mini-Burmecia
Description: A mini figurine found in Tantalus's hideout in the Theater District, Lindblum.

Name: Autograph
Description: Given to by Lowell in the Theater District studio in Lindblum.

Name: Moogle Suit
Description: A disguise used by Lowell to avert the rabid fans in Lindblum. Found in a chest of drawers in the studio near the station.

Name: Griffin's Heart
Description: An artifact bid on in the Treno Auction house. Can be sold for profit.

Name: Doga's Artifact
Description: A rare item which can be bought in the auction site in Treno. Can be sold for profit, and used for playing music in the Black Mage Village.

Name: Une's Mirror
Description: A rare item which can be bought in the auction site in Treno. Can be sold for profit, and used for playing music in the Black Mage Village.

Name: Rat Tail
Description: This item can be bid upon in the Treno Auction house. Can be sold for profit.

Name: Magical Fingertip
Description: A rare and expensive item bid on in the Treno auction house. After buying Doga's Artifact, Une's Mirror, Rat Tail, and Griffin's Heart first, and selling them to the citizens of Treno. Must also speak to an old man in Daguerreo to make the item appear. Sold only once. Given to the old man in Daguerreo to get the Excalibur.

Name: Red Stone
Description: One of the four colored stones on the Conde Petie Mountain Path.

Name: Blue Stone
Description: One of the four colored stones on the Conde Petie Mountain Path.

Name: Yellow Stone
Description: One of the four colored stones on the Conde Petie Mountain Path.

Name: Green Stone
Description: One of the four colored stones on the Conde Petie Mountain Path.

Name: Aries
Description: Given to Queen Stella for a reward. There are 13 Stellazzio coins in all.

Name: Taurus
Description: Given to Queen Stella for a reward. There are 13 Stellazzio coins in all.

Name: Gemini
Description: Given to Queen Stella for a reward. There are 13 Stellazzio coins in all.

Name: Cancer
Description: Given to Queen Stella for a reward. There are 13 Stellazzio coins in all.

Name: Leo
Description: Given to Queen Stella for a reward. There are 13 Stellazzio coins in all.

Name: Virgo
Description: Given to Queen Stella for a reward. There are 13 Stellazzio coins in all.

Name: Libra
Description: Given to Queen Stella for a reward. There are 13 Stellazzio coins in all.

Name: Scorpio
Description: Given to Queen Stella for a reward. There are 13 Stellazzio coins in all.

Name: Sagittarius
Description: Given to Queen Stella for a reward. There are 13 Stellazzio coins in all.

Name: Capricorn
Description: Given to Queen Stella for a reward. There are 13 Stellazzio coins in all.

Name: Aquarius
Description: Given to Queen Stella for a reward. There are 13 Stellazzio coins in all.

Name: Pisces
Description: Given to Queen Stella for a reward. There are 13 Stellazzio coins in all.

Name: Ophiuchus
Description: Found in Quan's Dwelling after giving Queen Stella twelve Stellazzio coins. Given to Queen Stella for the Hammer Key Item.

Name: Chocograph Piece
Description: There are 6 in all and after acquiring all 6 they form the Mist Ocean chocograph. Obtained from Chocobo Hot and Cold minigame.

Name: Rank S Medal
Description: Gotten by obtaining a S Rank in Treasure Hunting by finding enough treasures in the game, then going to Daguerreo and talking to the Four-Armed Man.

Name: Superslick
Description: Obtained from Ruby after delivering a series of Mognet letters. Used to make hair shine, or to fix the machine in Mognet Central.

Name: Strategy Guide
Description: Obtained by defeating Ozma.
